thread.title: This alternative to AirTags is cheap and just as good
thread.title_full: This alternative to AirTags is cheap and just as good

author: James Kaufman
title: This alternative to AirTags is cheap and just as good
text:
An alternative to AirTags that is almost identical, compatible with the iPhone's Search app and at a price that's hard to believe. This is the best alternative to AirTags and it is cheap
Join the conversation
Apple has revolutionized locator devices . On the one hand, it has launched the AirTag, a small infallible device that can be located when it is far away even if it does not have GPS or an internet connection. And on the other hand, creating the Search Network, a network to which AirTags connect and to which any manufacturer can access.
This means that anyone can make an equally good alternative to AirTags, since by using Apple's Search Network it can be located from the iPhone's Search app just like an AirTag. and one of the best alternatives It currently has very important discounts.
The ATUVOS Tag is on sale in different packs that are very worthwhile. On the one hand, we have a 20% discount with a coupon on the individual model which makes Its price drops to 17.59 euros on Amazon .
ATUVOS Bluetooth Object Locator
For just 17 euros you get the best alternative to AirTags
We also have on offer the package of two ATUVOS Tag with a 10 euro coupon which being remains in only 29.99 euros , each for less than 15 euros. And there is also the pack of 4 with a discount of another 10 euros that remains in 43.99 euros practically 11 euros for each device.
ATUVOS Bluetooth Object Locator (Pack of 2)
ATUVOS Bluetooth Object Locator (Pack of 4)
Like other Apple devices, ATUVOS Tag can also enter lost mode, this way you will be automatically notified when other devices or the Search Network detect it. You can also add your contact information so that when someone approaches your tag with an NFC-enabled smartphone, they can get your contact information to help you find the lost item.
The ATUVOS Tag works just like an AirTag and shares many of its functions. By just bringing it close to the iPhone you can add and configure it, from the Search app you can locate it on a map just like an AirTag, put it in lost mode or make it ring. In addition, being compatible with Red Search, Any iPhone, iPad or Mac on the planet will be able to locate the ATUVOS Tag making it more useful than other alternatives.
